channel.title: [PI] Question

item.title: [PI] Question
item.dc:creator: @FinalDestionation FinalDestionation
item.description:
@FinalDestionation wrote:

case 2085: for(int r=0; r<c.playerEquipment.length; r++) { int item = c.playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) { c.sendMessage("Please remove all armor and weapons before entering!"); return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport2(2271, 4680, 0); } } break; 

if(objectID == 2085) {
removeAllItems();
}

How do I make it take away the stuff in inventory, then if anything equipped, it tells you take it off, and then takes away?

Read full topic
